questions.question: ……………………. you have completed the work, you can go home.
questions.description: Now that can mean as a result of the fact

questions.question: People dislike communalism and all that it ………………………...
questions.description: To stand for is to represent.

questions.question: They had to ……………………… many difficulties during their journey.
questions.description: To put up with is to tolerate or endure.

questions.question: While I was looking for a book, I ………………………. this old photograph.
questions.description: To come across is to find or meet accidentally.

questions.question: You must ………………………. the challenge.
questions.description: To take up a challenge is to accept it.

questions.question: Did you ……………………… that story or is it true?
questions.description: To make up is to invent.

questions.question: He has ………………………. enough money for his daughter’s marriage.
questions.description: To put by is to save.

questions.question: He didn’t …………………………..
questions.description: To turn up is to come.

questions.question: The tyrant ………………………… all opposition.
questions.description: To put down is to suppress.

questions.question: It is only through experience that we ………………………… our shortcomings.
questions.description: To come to terms with is to accept.

questions.question: We all ……………………… him.
questions.description: To look up to somebody is to have great respect for them.

questions.question: The teacher ………………………… the students to work hard.
questions.description: To call upon is to exhort.
